testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the user
testcase.name: Verify the add user functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in user management page...................................passed When the user clicks on Add button in Search Users page.....................passed Then the user is in Add User Page...........................................passed When user adds with parameters "Admin", "Enabled", "Collings", "Bala S", "Bala@123", "Bala@123".passed And the user clicks on Save button in Add User Page.........................passed Then the user with "Bala S" should be saved and added to the user records...passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the user
testcase.name: Verify the edit user and delete user functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user navigates to already created user with "Bala S"..............passed When the user clicks on edit button for the user with "Bala S"..............passed Then the user is in Edit User Page..........................................passed When user edits with parameters "ESS", "Disabled"...........................passed And the user clicks on Save button in Edit user page........................passed Then the "Bala S" should be updated to the user records with "ESS", "Disabled".passed And user notes the total records of the users...............................passed When the user clicks on delete button for the user with "Bala S"............passed And the user clicks YES on Are you sure? Dialog.............................passed Then the user "Bala S" will be deleted from the user records................passed
